sentences.english: Not only is our poor Planet Earth suffering from natural calamities, it is battered by man-made disASters AS well.
sentences.chinese: 现今可怜的地球不仅是天灾频仍，人祸更是接踵不断。

sentences.english: There were almost no non-disaster years in late Qing Dynasty of China's social situation .
sentences.chinese: 晚清的中国社会灾情频仍，几乎无年不灾。

sentences.english: Earth suffering from natural calamities, it is battered by man-made disASters AS well.
sentences.chinese: 现今可怜的地球不仅是天灾频仍，人祸更是接踵不断。

sentences.english: Amid Taiwan's political transition, the press ban was lifted in 1988.
sentences.chinese: 1988年台湾开放报禁，但开放后报业问题频仍。

sentences.english: But the frequent war destroyed the dream of Chinese and Japanese pacifists.
sentences.chinese: 但频仍的战争破坏了中日两国和平主义者的梦想。

definition: the people's livelihood is reduced to destitution (idiom); a time of famine and impoverishment
The people have no way to make a living (idiom, from Record of the Grand Historian 史記|史记[Shi3 ji4])/no way of getting by
to fall into disuse (of laws, customs etc)/to neglect
lit. fire beacons in all four directions (idiom); the confusion of war
the fire of war in all four directions (idiom); the confusion of war
the people are impoverished, their means exhausted (idiom); to drive the nation to bankruptcy
arms and confusion (idiom); turmoil of war
